# Markdown Rules (Compressed)

## Format & Structure
- **Headers**: H2 (`##`) Â» H3 (`###`); No H1 (title auto-gen).
- **Lists**: Bullets `-`; Numbers `1.`; 2-space indent nested.
- **Code**: Fenced ` ```lang `; specify language.
- **Links/Img**: `[txt](url)`; `![alt](url)`; descriptive alt.
- **Tables**: `| col |` align proper.
- **Wrap**: ~88 chars/line (soft break); max 400.
- **Space**: Blank line betw sections.

## Validation
- **Front Matter (req)**: `post_title`, `author1`, `post_slug`, `microsoft_alias`, `featured_image`, `categories`, `tags`, `ai_note`, `summary`, `post_date`.
- **Compliance**: Valid links, proper hierarchy, no HTML if md suffices.
